summary:
IT Professional with 14+ years of experience which spread across analysis, design, development and maintenance of various Java applications and production support projects with various Global Retail and Banking Clients. 

Started my career as Software Developer trained in Java/J2EE, have good experience in SDLC and worked in projects which use both Agile and Water Fall methodologies and also have good exposure to CI/CD and DevOps principles.

Played various other roles like Team lead,Onsite coordinator,Technical Support Engineer, Software developer, Incident manager.

Extensive knowledge of Application and Business monitoring using following technologies - ELK , Grafana, Prometheus/Influx DB , AppDynamics, Splunk, GDL, Dynatrace , Linux server/VMs.

Expert in Automation using Shell script to observe anomalies and take proactive actions to prevent issues.

Good problem solving skills and the ability to come up with quick and creative solutions has always been my strength.

Expert in Incident, Problem, Release & Knowledge Management, facilitating daily stand-up, retrospective meetings, Post mortem of Major issues, root cause analysis and take issues to closure.
Expert in People Management - Managed multiple teams across geographies.
Experience in working on multiple technology platforms.
Experience in MySQL,Oracle,Terradata,Postgres databases
Good hands-on experience in using tools like JIRA, Confluence, Service Now, HP ALM, Soap UI , Postman, MAVEN, Github.
Certified SAFe Agilist (4.5)
Working knowledge in SOAP/Rest Webservices, JQuery,JavaScript,Ajax, JSP,HTML,CSS,XMLBeginner in Python, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Azure, Typescript.

school.name: Government Engineering College, Trivandrum, Kerala University

profile_positions.description:
My main responsibilities were: lead the Digital Support team responsible for coordinating quality and continuity activities, solve and mitigate Digital operational issues and handling escalations. Analyze and report on customer feedback, understand the customer needs and advise Product Owners on potential improvements of their digital application. Functional and technical monitoring of APIs in the applications, set up of alerts and proactively identifying and managing risks which may impact the performance of the applications.

Also work together with various teams to to identify process improvements and cost saving opportunities.

I've been acknowledged for my interpersonal and communication skills and am capable of leading cross functional teams and cultivating strong relationships with customers.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead | Quality of Service | Digital International | Fedex Express

profile_positions.description:
Lead the Application Support Offshore (15+ FTEs) responsible for  Incident ,problem ,change & request handling, performance improvements,SQL query preparations for reporting purposes, monitoring/managing batch jobs, data fixes, system monitoring using grafana dashboards, Set up of alerts, log analysis,code debugging,coordination with development team,mentoring juniors. Helped increasing the application stability to nearly 100%.

• Proactively developed multiple automations for day to day support activities in java and shell scripting
• Prioritizing the support tasks and distributing to team members
• Set up and Monitoring the grafana support dashboards for tracking the server health(server down, cpu usage spikes in graphs etc)
• Performing data fixes as part of daily support activities.
• Frequent interaction with business/end users to understand the issues and give them proper resolutions.
• Performed the role of incident manager during critical issues.
• Organize and discuss key issues with onsite coordinators and secure handover daily.
• Identify fraudulent activities by Log analysis using shell script
• Preparation of weekly/monthly business reports and helped client achieving key objectives.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead | Telluride | Sears

Mar 2011 - Feb 2013

• Requirement analysis, design, implementation ,code review and independent unit testing of multiple UI screens in offer module
• Preparation of HLD’s & LLD’s document
• Developed UI screens using Spring frameworks,xml,javascript,jsp,spring tags,jquery,ajax(REST)
• Investigation, reproduction and fixing of reported issues/bugs or interoperability problems
• Working on onsite/offshore model
